info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 15 at 9:58PM CST until February 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN PITTSBURG COUNTY... At 957 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Ashland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Savanna... Ashland... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
